name: College of Artillery
description:
Produces Royal Artillery siege engines, which do +30% more damage, and unlocks the Artillery ability for Cannons.
Contains Siege and Gunpowder Technologies, trains units and researches technologies 50% faster.
• Royal Cannon
• Royal Ribauldequin
• Royal Culverin
